events.name: Leicester City at Brighton & Hove Albion

headlines.description: — Brighton maintained its impressive start to the Premier League season with a 2-1 win over Leicester on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brighton extends strong start with 2-1 win over Leicester

events.name: Manchester United at West Ham United

headlines.description: Super-sub Jesse Lingard scored a stunning last-minute winner as Manchester United secured a comeback 2-1 win at West Ham on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lingard, De Gea earn dramatic late Man Utd win

headlines.description: Chelsea earned an impressive 3-0 win at Tottenham on Sunday thanks to second-half goals from Thiago Silva, N'Golo Kante and Antonio Rudiger.
headlines.shortLinkText: Chelsea's second-half goal flurry sinks Spurs
